GO_INSTALL_TOOLS_IN_IMAGE.description: Installs the go toolchain in the final Heroku slug. Must be 'true'

GO_SETUP_GOPATH_IN_IMAGE.description: Sets the $GOPATH, aswell as other things. Must be 'true'

GH_PAN.description: Github Personal Access Token (must have full access to the 'repos' section). Used to clone private repositories
